outline:
1. to scatter, be dispersed, be scattered
    1. (Qal) to be dispersed, be scattered
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be scattered
      2. to be spread abroad
    3. (Hiphil) to scatter
    4. Hithpael) scatter
  2. (Qal) to flow, overflow
  3. to break
    1. (Polel) to shatter
    2. (Pilpel) to dash to pieces
kjv_def: break (dash, shake) in (to) pieces, cast (abroad), disperse (selves), drive, retire, scatter (abroad), spread abroad.
strongs_def: to dash in pieces, literally or figuratively (especially to disperse)
